meanings.definition: The quality or state of being abusive.
meanings.sent1: Her abusiveness towards others made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: The abusiveness of his words left a lasting impact on her.
meanings.sent3: Despite his abusiveness, she found humor in his exaggerated gestures.
meanings.sent4: The abusiveness of the storm was evident in the destruction it left behind.
meanings.sent5: The abusiveness of the situation was palpable, causing tension in the room.

meanings.definition: The tendency to engage in abusive behavior.
meanings.sent1: His abusiveness towards animals was a cause for concern among his neighbors.
meanings.sent2: Recognizing the abusiveness in his actions, she decided to report him to the authorities.
meanings.sent3: Despite his abusiveness, he was oblivious to the impact of his behavior.
meanings.sent4: The abusiveness of his behavior was like a dark cloud hanging over their relationship.
meanings.sent5: The abusiveness of his words cut deep, leaving emotional scars that took time to heal.
